attributes.action: To make Joanna Lumley a Dame for services to the Ghurkas
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For outstanding service to the Armed forces of the UK Joanna to be made a Dame.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
